titles.title: A resolution recognizing Portugal's special relationship with the United States, and the contribution of Portuguese Americans to American life.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on Foreign Relations.
Senate Committee on Foreign Relations discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment and with a preamble by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 6/9/1994--Introduced. Recognizes Portugal for its special relationship with, and Portuguese people for their special contributions to, the United States.
